txt.en: 'Go into the Ettenmoors and slaughter Elves. Carve the ears from their skulls and return them to me so that I can flay them into strips that will be used to fertilize the soil for growing your sapling. In time, the sapling will learn to covet the flavour of an Elf.'
Deliver Elf-ears to Cinaid at Gramsfoot
'Your work is efficient and cruel. The malice with which you carry out your tasks will transfer to your sapling and you will breed it into a vile creature that is sworn to our host.'
Cinaid orders you to collect the ears of Elves to broaden the bloodthirst that your sapling will have.
Cinaid directed you to slaughter Elves in the Ettenmoors and carve off their ears so that the strips can be added to the soil that feeds your sapling.
Deliver Elf-ears to Cinaid at Gramsfoot ([placeholder]/7)
